spotlights.title: Performance Turnaround on a Busy WP Property
spotlights.problem: Site admin points out poor repair rates had been due to a broken database and general caching strategy.
spotlights.action: Audited and reviewed database automated caching, implemented a more intelligent frequency at the core with better compression, and tuned the TTFB/cache hit.
spotlights.impact: Admin reports massive ~50ms faster, and page speed CWV/session improved with better first-time visitor experience.

spotlights.title: Attribution That Trains Media the Right Way
spotlights.problem: Ad platforms were optimizing for weak signals, making all their campaigns as much conversion and working against.
spotlights.action: Re-designed Google Tag Manager as a centralized event model, created high-level events from server-side CRM events and post-training evaluations as a new very purchase and post-training evaluations as.
spotlights.impact: Lowered Cost Per Acquisition (CPA), delivered a higher Return On Ad Spend (ROAS), and delivered more future analytics with these have positive conversions.

spotlights.title: Edge-First Security Hardening
spotlights.problem: Manual security policy, WAF, API flows and login brute force attacks were testing server and security risks.
spotlights.action: Built automated defense at the CloudFlare edge, including rate limiting, WAF, associated bots on suspicious platforms, and provided bot management.
spotlights.impact: Attacks stopped reaching origin server, resulting in a dramatic decrease in origin server risk and costs in the logs.

spotlights.title: Training Lifecycle Automation (Commerce ‚Üí Learning ‚Üí CRM)
spotlights.problem: Manual handoffs between sales, training, and marketing were causing delays in onboarding, certification tracking, and CRM segmentation.
spotlights.action: Implemented a fully automated end-to-end system where e-commerce purchases auto-enroll into learning groups, completion events auto-update CRM tags, and post-training surveys trigger PQRST back to directory eligibility.
spotlights.impact: Achieved near-certificate stopping, linear support tickets, and created segmentation across flows that accurately predict a user's real-time status.

playbooks.title: Evaluation ‚Üí Tag ‚Üí Cart
playbooks.description: A standardized flow where a form submission triggers an automation that tags the data to a spreadsheet, applies the correct tags in the CRM, starts a post-course email sequence, and unlocks the user's certificates.

playbooks.title: Group Enrollment ‚Üí CRM Sync
playbooks.description: An event-driven workflow where a change in a user's learning group membership automatically updates the relevant training metadata, applies the correct tags and segments in the CRM, and notifies the relevant internal teams.

playbooks.title: Completion ‚Üí Directory Eligibility
playbooks.description: A combination of automated and manual checks that, when triggered, mark a user's training as complete in the CRM and make their status as 'eligible' in public-facing provider directories.

playbooks.title: Event Schema ‚Üí Self-Serve Dashboards
playbooks.description: A data architecture model where normalized event and venue fields are the single source of truth. A new list then pulls data from CRM, collects, and turns to surface critical KPIs like enrollment velocity and risk flags.
